juding_criteria:
Output from Part 2:

Here is a bullet list of required elements:
*   A person sitting on the white sofa
*   A coffee mug held by the person
*   White sectional sofa
*   Marble coffee table
*   Open book on the coffee table
*   Driftwood sculpture on the coffee table
*   Glass vase with green leaves on the coffee table
*   Set of black candle holders with white candles on the coffee table
*   Black leather armchair (partially visible)
*   Tall potted plants in the background
*   Large window with black frames
*   View of buildings/balcony through the window
*   Light-colored rug (partially visible)
*   Small, round, copper-colored side table
*   Fur throw draped over a sofa arm
*   Dark grey pillows on the sofa
*   Patterned pillow on the sofa
*   White walls
